attributes.action: Charge the bankers responsible for the collapse and subsequent £700 billion bailout(theft) from taxpayers without a referendum
attributes.additional_details: While our soceity correctly arrests and charges those responsible for the recent looting on our streets the bankers who were involved with the banking collapse and the subsequent government bailout of £700 billion have not been brought to justice. We the people require a referendum on whether that money should have been given to the banks without our permission and for those individuals responsible for the collapse to face justice in our soceity
